segments.text: Thank you for coming to see me off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I have time , I will come again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are welcome at any time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for your hospitality . I hope I didn ’ t cause you too much trouble during my stay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid I have to go now . The plane will take off soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Call us as soon as you got home .
segments.speaker: S2
